attributes.action: Demand a vote of no confidence in the labour government
attributes.background: With light of the incompetence of this labour government it’s time for change starting with a vote of no confidence in parliament

rejection.details:
We cannot allow petitions asking for a vote of no confidence in an individual Minister or the Government as a whole. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
